title: News
description: Latest updates from UAB - The University of Alabama at Birmingham
cleaned_text: Research - News [ Novel preclinical drug could have potential to combat depression, brain injury and cognitive disorders ](/news/research/item/12861-novel-preclinical-drug-could-have-potential-to-combat-depression-brain-injury-and-cognitive-disorders) [ Vohra receives $540k grant from U.S. Department of Energy's National Nuclear Security Administration ](/news/research/item/12812-vohra-receives-540k-grant-from-u-s-department-of-energy-s-national-nuclear-security-administration) [ Cancer: Sialylation of the epidermal growth factor receptor modulates cell mechanics and enhances invasion ](/news/research/item/12797-cancer-sialylation-of-the-epidermal-growth-factor-receptor-modulates-cell-mechanics-and-enhances-invasion) [ A key brain region for substance use disorders now has a searchable atlas of distinct cell populations ](/news/research/item/12778-r-i-a-key-brain-region-for-substance-use-disorders-now-has-a-searchable-atlas-of-distinct-cell-populations) [ Genetic variation common among Black individuals is associated with higher risk of heart failure and death ](/news/research/item/12772-genetic-variation-common-among-black-individuals-is-associated-with-higher-risk-of-heart-failure-and-death) [ Researchers find that genetic scores may identify risk of heart disease for people with Type 2 diabetes ](/news/research/item/12742-researchers-find-that-genetic-scores-may-identify-risk-of-heart-disease-for-people-with-type-2-diabetes) [ Similar rates of COVID-related acute kidney injury found in early adolescents and older adults, study shows ](/news/research/item/12735-similar-rates-of-covid-related-acute-kidney-injury-found-in-early-adolescents-and-older-adults-study-shows) Researchers have been awarded a $2.6 million, four-year National Institutes of Health grant to evaluate a safer and more durable stent design, using techniques licensed
